data.title: Hampton Rovers Football Club
data.meta_description: Hampton Rovers Football Club has a strong presence at the elite level, with nine players currently on AFL lists in 2024, with Archie Roberts the most recent Rovers player drafted, […]
data.text:
Hampton Rovers Football Club has a strong presence at the elite level, with nine players currently on AFL lists in 2024, with Archie Roberts the most recent Rovers player drafted, by Essendon at pick 54 in the 2023 Draft. In recent years, the club has had three players picked in the top 10 in their respective years (Angus Brayshaw, Andrew Brayshaw and Christian Salem).

Current AFL Players

Karl AMON

HAWTHORN #10

Junior Clubs: Hampton Rovers, East Sandringham

Rovers Games: 7 (2011-2012)

School: Haileybury

Recruited from: Sandringham Dragons

Drafted: 2013 (pick 68) – Port Adelaide

AFL Debut: 2015 round 7

Miles BERGMAN

PORT ADELAIDE #14

Junior Clubs: Hampton Rovers, East Brighton (U13-14)

Rovers Games: 92 (2009-2018)

School: St Bedes College

Drafted: 2019 (pick 14)

AFL Debut: 2021 round 1

Angus BRAYSHAW

MELBOURNE #10

Junior Club: Hampton Rovers

Rovers Games: 124 (2003-2011)

School: Haileybury

Recruited from: Sandringham Dragons

Drafted: 2014 (pick 3)

AFL Debut: 2015 round 1

Andrew BRAYSHAW

FREMANTLE DOCKERS #8

Junior Club: Hampton Rovers

Rovers Games: 112 (2008-2014)

School: Haileybury

Recruited from: Sandringham Dragons

Drafted: 2017 (pick 2)

AFL Debut: 2018 round 1

Olli HOTTON

ST KILDA #39

Junior Club: Hampton Rovers

Rovers Games: 113 (2012-2022)

School: Haileybury

Recruited from: Sandringham Dragons

Drafted: 2022 (pick 35)

Brayden MAYNARD

COLLINGWOOD #4

Junior Club: Hampton Rovers

Rovers Games: 53 (2010-2013)

School: De La Salle

Recruited from: Sandringham Dragons

Drafted: 2014 (pick 30)

AFL Debut: 2015 round 14

Christian SALEM

MELBOURNE #3

Junior Club: Hampton Rovers

Rovers Games: 70 (2004-2010)

School: Brighton Grammar

Recruited from: Sandringham Dragons

Drafted: 2013 (pick 9)

AFL Debut: 2014 round 6

Archie ROBERTS

ESSENDON

Junior Club: Hampton Rovers

Rovers Games: 109

School: Haileybury

Recruited from: Sandringham Dragons

Drafted: 2023 (pick 54)

AFL Debut: 2024 round 21

Jayden HUNT

WEST COAST EAGLES #5

Junior Clubs: East Sandringham, Hampton Rovers

Rovers Games: 10 (2011)

School: Brighton Grammar

Recruited from: Sandringham Dragons

Drafted: 2013 (pick 57) – Melbourne FC

AFL Debut: 2016 round 4

Former AFL/VFL Players

The Hampton Rovers Football Club has had in excess of 20 players who’ve played with the club in the VAFA (U19/Seniors) and progressed to play in the VFL/AFL, including Brownlow Medallist Ross Smith. Below is a list of them, and more recently, those who played junior or senior football at the Rovers, progressed to the AFL but are no longer on AFL lists.
